DOC.brief_summary: Investigate safety/tolerability single dose intranasal administration DSP-3025 comparator placebo healthy male volunteer seasonal allergic rhinitis male patient season .
DOC.brief_title: DSP-3025 Study Healthy Male Volunteers Seasonal Allergic Rhinitis Male Patients Out Season
DOC.criteria: Body mass index ( BMI ) 18.5 25 kg/ m2 weight 50 80 kg No clinically relevant abnormal finding History cedar and/or Japanese cypress pollen induce seasonal allergic rhinitis least previous 2 year ( Allergic rhinitis ) Acute illness require medical intervention Definite suspect personal history adverse drug reaction drug hypersensitivity Clinical relevant disease disorder ( past present ) A history asthma
